text_block_list.name: Fuji Kiseki
text_block_list.text: Errr… ah.

text_block_list.name: Fuji Kiseki
text_block_list.text:
…What a coincidence, Trainer. 
Out on an evening walk? Actually, I, too, was just――
choice_data_list: You don't look like you're here to take a walk.
You don't look like you're here to take a walk.

text_block_list.name: Fuji Kiseki
text_block_list.text: That's…
choice_data_list: Are you worried, about the Selection Race?
Are you worried, about the Selection Race?

text_block_list.name: Fuji Kiseki
text_block_list.text:
N, no!! I am the Uma Musume that makes "miracles" happen! 
That's…!

text_block_list.name: Fuji Kiseki
text_block_list.text: Ah, that's not… I'm sorry. I didn't mean to raise my voice…

text_block_list.name: Fuji Kiseki
text_block_list.text:
Haah… 
I suppose you saw right through to my panic. I've still got a 
ways to go, it seems.

Smiling a little awkwardly, Fuji Kiseki took a deep breath and 
spoke calmly.

text_block_list.name: Fuji Kiseki
text_block_list.text: …The Selection Race is a special occasion.

text_block_list.name: Fuji Kiseki
text_block_list.text:
Only those who have reached the point where they are ready to 
truly run as Uma Musume, and are ready to take the first clear 
step toward the Twinkle Series, can step onto the track――

text_block_list.name: Fuji Kiseki
text_block_list.text:
Of course, this is a different story from the mock race 
the other day. The expectations, and the level of the girls 
participating, they're different.

text_block_list.name: Fuji Kiseki
text_block_list.text: But, I――

text_block_list.name: Fuji Kiseki
text_block_list.text:
…Trainer, how do you think I've looked so far? 
Was I able to produce a show of a "Fuji Kiseki" with great 
ability, overflowing with confidence in herself?
choice_data_list: It sure looked that way to me.

text_block_list.name: Fuji Kiseki
text_block_list.text: I'd be happy if that were true. I always wish I could be.

text_block_list.name: Fuji Kiseki
text_block_list.text: But… The truth is, that's not enough.

text_block_list.name: Fuji Kiseki
text_block_list.text:
Today's incident is no different. If I had paid more attention to 
that girl every day, she might not have snuck out of her dorm.

text_block_list.name: Fuji Kiseki
text_block_list.text:
Even now… I know I should rest, but when I think about 
tomorrow… I can't, be still…

Fuji Kiseki fell silent, an anxious look on her face. 
Unless she clears her mind, she might continue to push herself 
too far.

What can we do for her…? 
How can we cheer up the one who aspires to be an 
entertainer――?

text_block_list.name: Fuji Kiseki
text_block_list.text:
As long as there is an audience expecting the "Miracle Kiseki," 
it is the entertainer's duty to satisfy their expectations to the 
best of her ability.

text_block_list.name: Fuji Kiseki
text_block_list.text: …? Trainer, what's the matter?

text_block_list.name: Fuji Kiseki
text_block_list.text: What? Ah… Hey, Trainer!?

text_block_list.name: Hishi Amazon
text_block_list.text:
Oh, it's you! 
That face… Could it be, maybe ya found Fuji!?
choice_data_list: Yeah, about that, I need a little favor.
Yeah, about that, I need a little favor.

text_block_list.name: Hishi Amazon
text_block_list.text: Heh? A favor…?
choice_data_list: I wanted to ease her worries.

text_block_list.name: Hishi Amazon
text_block_list.text: Hmmm… Let me hear it all.

I explained the situation to Hishi Amazon and asked for her 
cooperation. 
Then――

text_block_list.name: Fuji Kiseki
text_block_list.text:
Ah, Trainer! 
What on earth are you doing he… Wait, eh!?

text_block_list.name: Fuji Kiseki
text_block_list.text: Everyone, why, here…!?

text_block_list.name: Hishi Amazon
text_block_list.text:
Nothin' you can do about it. That Trainer told me to get this lot 
together to root for you in your Selection Race.

text_block_list.name: Hishi Amazon
text_block_list.text:
And then, more of them kept coming and coming… 
They were all going to write an apology letter afterwards for 
staying out past curfew, what an odd bunch.

text_block_list.name: Biko Pegasus
text_block_list.text:
Fuji-senpai, did you really train in secret!? Just the kind of 
thing you'd expect from Senpai!! 
You're always helping everyone, you're like a hero!

text_block_list.name: Biko Pegasus
text_block_list.text:
So, tomorrow, I'm going to shout, "Senpai, you've got thiiis!" 
with all my might!!

text_block_list.name: Mayano Top Gun
text_block_list.text:
Maya too, Maya too! Your races are always so cool!! 
I'll be cheering for you while having lots of fun!!

text_block_list.name: Junior Horsegirls
text_block_list.text:
Fuji-senpai! Fuji-senpai, you can do it! 
Fuji-senpai…!!

text_block_list.name: Fuji Kiseki
text_block_list.text: Everyone…
choice_data_list: Everyone, and I, believe in your "Kiseki Miracle."
Everyone, and I, believe in your "Kiseki Miracle."

text_block_list.name: Fuji Kiseki
text_block_list.text: My "Kiseki Miracle"…
choice_data_list: So you, too, must believe in your "miracle."
So you, too, must believe in your "miracle."

text_block_list.name: Fuji Kiseki
text_block_list.text: …Hahaha. You got me, Trainer.

text_block_list.name: Fuji Kiseki
text_block_list.text: I can't show these girls something unseemly. No, I definitely don't want to show them that.

text_block_list.name: Fuji Kiseki
text_block_list.text: Let's head back――with high chins and smiling faces.
Thus, Fuji Kiseki returned to the dormitory and rested.
Then, the next morning, in the Selection Race, she――

text_block_list.name: Commentator
text_block_list.text:
Here comes the third corner! Coming up from the outside in a 
flash is… 
The "Black Meteor" Fuji Kiseki! She makes up for her slow start!

text_block_list.name: Junior Students
text_block_list.text: Senpai, you've got thisーーー!!

text_block_list.name: Fuji Kiseki
text_block_list.text:
(…My worries are not all gone. I am, after all, just a 
novice… who isn't enough to be "Fuji Kiseki.")

text_block_list.name: Fuji Kiseki
text_block_list.text:
(Though――nevertheless, I'm still in front of an audience! In 
front of the girls watching! 
As the Entertainer, I'll never give up… my last pride!)

text_block_list.name: Commentator
text_block_list.text:
Fuji Kiseki, in the lead, speeds down the final straight! The 
gap between the second-place finisher is an astonishing 8 
lengths! This was, truly, her one-man show!!

text_block_list.name: Fuji Kiseki
text_block_list.text:
(Forget about your fatigue, play it cool and smile! That's what 
"Fuji Kiseki" would do! Come on, until the very last, let's 
enchant them all…!)

text_block_list.name: Fuji Kiseki
text_block_list.text: This is――my "Kiseki Miracle"!!

text_block_list.name: Commentator
text_block_list.text:
Fuji Kiseki, in first place, takes the goooooaaaaallll!! 
An absolutely thunderous round of applause for her stunning 
performance!!

text_block_list.name: Junior Horsegirl C
text_block_list.text:
Fuji Kiseki-senpai, thank you… for the wonderful race. 
Thanks to you, I remembered… what I longed for, what my 
dreams were!

text_block_list.name: Fuji Kiseki
text_block_list.text:
Haah… Goodness, I'm beat. 
I'm not much of a sore muscle kind of Uma, but I'm dreading 
tomorrow, indeed.
choice_data_list: Good job, we saw a great "Kiseki Miracle" out there.
Good job, we saw a great "Kiseki Miracle" out there.

text_block_list.name: Fuji Kiseki
text_block_list.text: Fufu, I'm glad!

text_block_list.name: Fuji Kiseki
text_block_list.text:
The audience's expectations are a burden you must shoulder, 
something that you must meet. 
That's what I thought, but――

text_block_list.name: Fuji Kiseki
text_block_list.text:
At the same time, it can be something that gives you the 
greatest power of all. 
…You taught me that.

text_block_list.name: Fuji Kiseki
text_block_list.text:
Trainer. If only you could… 
from now on, continue to guide me?

text_block_list.name: Fuji Kiseki
text_block_list.text:
I think you and I, we could entertain everyone with even more 
wonderful "Miracles"…!

Thus, I signed an exclusive contract with Fuji Kiseki, the 
Entertainer that delights everyone…!
